title: Hot Spinach and Artichoke Dip
directions: "Place the spinach, artichokes and water in a 2-quart saucepan over high heat. Cook just until the vegetables are heated through. Drain and squeeze as much liquid out as possible.
Heat the cream cheese in a microwave oven for 1 minute, or until hot and soft. Add the drained spinach and artichokes as well as the remaining ingredients. Stir to combine and serve hot.
Note: You can also use jarred or canned artichokes but if you do you'll want to cut the water by half. "
